data.eml:eml: The Afrotropical Robber Fly Genus Congomochtherus Oldroyd, 1979 (Diptera: Asilidae: Asilinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jason G. H. Londt (2014): The Afrotropical Robber Fly Genus Congomochtherus Oldroyd, 1979 (Diptera: Asilidae: Asilinae). African Invertebrates 55 (2): 333-350, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.5733/afin.055.0204
